about_the_game:
Dive into the magical world of Dal Riata with Celtic Heroes, a free-to-play 3D MMORPG designed for mobile and PC devices. Choose from five unique character classes—Druid, Mage, Ranger, Rogue, or Warrior—each offering distinct abilities and gameplay styles. Engage in epic quests, battle mythical creatures, and trade thousands of items in a rich, interactive world.

Join forces with other players in real-time combat, form strategic alliances, and become part of a vibrant community. Whether you’re exploring dark forests or battling formidable enemies, Celtic Heroes provides a deep, engaging experience that challenges your strategic thinking and skill development.

Perfect for fans of fantasy and mythology, this game allows you to experience the thrill of adventure and the camaraderie of multiplayer action anytime, anywhere. Start your journey in Celtic Heroes today and become a true hero of the Celtic lands!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Celtic Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Are you looking for that classic MMORPG vibe? Whether you're a minmaxer strategizing every detail for maximum efficiency, a savvy fashion collector in search of the most stunning outfits, or even someone who enjoys the journey of casual leveling, Celtic Heroes opens its gates to you!
